messages.content: How to print hello world in python?

To print hello world in Python, you can use the print function. For example, the following code will print the letters 'hello world':
print ('hello world')
How to print the same in java?

To print hello world in Java, you can use the System.out.println() method. For example, the following code will print the letters 'hello world':
System.out.println ("hello world")
